    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item : is_faucet(faucet) and inside(faucet, dining_room)
    return has_faucet

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists dining_room: item : is_dining_room(dining_room) and has_faucet(dining_room):
            # Check if there is a known dining room with a faucet
            bind dining_room: item where:
                is_dining_room(dining_room) and has_faucet(dining_room)
            # Select the dining room that contains a faucet
            achieve close_char(char, dining_room)

            # If no such dining room is known based on the information, start observing for it
            foreach dining_room: item:
                if is_dining_room(dining_room) and not visited(dining_room):
                    observe(dining_room, "Check if there is any faucet inside the dining room")

def has_faucet(sink:item):
    # Determine whether this sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
    return has_faucet

behavior fill_cup_with_water(cup:item, faucet:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(cup) # Temporarily hold the cup
        achieve is_on(faucet) # Turn on the faucet
        achieve has_water(cup) # Fill the cup with water
        achieve is_off(faucet) # Turn off the faucet

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and inside(sink, dining_room_201)
        # Select the sink in the dining room
        
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup) and inside(cup, dining_room_201)
        # Select a cup in the dining room
        
        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            # Select the faucet that is close to the sink
            
            fill_cup_with_water(cup, faucet)
